summary: This is a brief email correspondence dated August 5, 2021, with the subject 'Camera Documentation', forwarding attached documentation. The sender and recipient are not named in the provided text, but the email addresses suggest a connection to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

events.title: Email Forwarding Camera Documentation
events.description: An email was sent with the subject 'Camera Documentation' containing attached documentation, as indicated by the text 'Attached is the documentation you requested.'

keyFacts: An email regarding 'Camera Documentation' was sent on August 5, 2021.
The email addresses in the text reference the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The correspondence involves the forwarding of attached documentation as requested.
